title: Riverside Lunch Delights in Toyosu
description: Discover a variety of lunch options right next to Toyosu Market. From renowned Yakiniku restaurants to casual diners and artisan roasteries, we introduce Toyosu's unique lunch spots.
content:
# Riverside Lunch Delights in Toyosu

The Toyosu area, developed around Toyosu Market, charms visitors with its fresh ingredients and modern cityscape. In this district, lined with large commercial facilities, we'll introduce you to various spots where you can enjoy diverse lunch options. Experience a unique Toyosu lunch amidst the refreshing open atmosphere by the water.

## Yakiniku Specialty Restaurant

<Place id="ChIJhdgCC6OJGGARStzc6yI1zxQ" />
A renowned restaurant right in front of Toyosu Station where you can savor authentic Yakiniku. Using carefully selected Wagyu beef, they offer reasonably priced set menus during lunchtime. The high quality of the meat and the attentive service from experienced staff are key attractions. It's a popular spot in Toyosu where you can enjoy a genuine Yakiniku experience even at lunch. Highly recommended for lunch with colleagues or for a special meal.

## Casual Diner

<Place id="ChIJzU2euaGJGGAR4wDbqIkS4To" />
A casual diner located in Toyosu Foresia. Focusing on American-style cuisine, they offer a wide array of hearty lunch menus. With plenty of easy-to-enjoy options like burgers and pasta, it's also popular among families. You can spend a relaxed lunch time in the restaurant's open and welcoming atmosphere. This is a great spot for a casual lunch in Toyosu.

## Coffee Roastery

<Place id="ChIJvbeLhqGJGGAR1hQFynE4KFs" />
A roastery cafe in Toyosu where you can enjoy freshly roasted coffee. During lunchtime, they also offer light meal options such as sandwiches and salads. Indulge in a healthy and delicious lunch alongside aromatic, freshly roasted coffee. The tranquil ambiance of the cafe is perfect for a leisurely lunch. Enhance your lunch experience in Toyosu with a superb cup of coffee.

## Enjoy a Fulfilling Lunch in Toyosu
